name: Mapo Tofu
imgAlt: Spicy Sichuan tofu dish in red chili oil
instructions: Heat oil in wok and brown ground pork.
Add garlic, ginger, and doubanjiang, stir-fry until fragrant.
Pour in chicken stock and soy sauce, bring to simmer.
Gently add tofu cubes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Mix cornstarch with water and add to thicken sauce.
Toast Sichuan peppercorns and crush coarsely.
Garnish with green onions and peppercorns, serve over rice.
